attributes.action: Publicise the actual symptoms of Covid-19  that now occur.
attributes.additional_details:
Because Government advice still lists the original 2020 symptoms, many people are unaware that they should be getting a test, and go to work or education, where they pass the disease to others.
This contributes to the UK showing twice the prevalence of Covid-19 as its continental neighbours.
If the advice is updated, more people will be tested and isolate if they are positive.
attributes.background:
The top symptoms of the delta variant of Covid-19 in children and vaccinated people are now:
Runny Nose (76%); Headache (75%); Sneezing (66%); Sore Throat (52%) and Loss of Smell (52%).
Government should list these symptoms, so people find out if they are infected and do not pass on the disease.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Expand and publicise the list of Covid 19 symptoms for free PCR tests:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597393
